Directions: In a bowl, combine flour and salt.  Whisk together eggs and milk; stir into dry ingredients just until blended.  Pour into four greased and floured 8-oz. custard cups.  Place on a baking sheet.  Bake, uncovered, at 425 degrees F for 20 minutes or until puffed and edges are golden brown (do not open the oven door during baking).
